articles.content:

All-rounder Ravindra Jadeja has been cleared to participate in the series-opening Nagpur Test against Australia by the National Cricket Academy. A fit… [+1466 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Suryakumar Yadav Takes Stunning Catch In Slips, Then Does 'Copy-Paste' - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav grabbed two identically outrageous catches, both on the bowling of Hardik Pandya, as India rattled New Zealand's top-order in 3rd T20I.
articles.content: Chasing a mammoth total of 235 runs, New Zealand got off to the worst-possible start as they lost 4 wickets for a score of 7 runs. Hardik Pandya and Arshdeep Singh bagged two wickets among themselves… [+1801 chars]

articles.title: Khawaja's India visa belatedly issued ahead of tour - DAWN.com
